start:
Hi, I'm a bot that will show you the weather anywhere in the world.
For now I can only show the weather by the exact name of the city, but I hope to be able to recognize any values soon.
Use the command /help to show the instructions.
My creator is @MaksGovorrr.
help:
I have three teams so far.
It's very simple:
/weather + {city name} to show the weather in this part of the world right now.
/weather5days + {city name} - show the weather for 5 days, you can flick through the days with arrows.
You can also send me the location
empty_command:
You must enter /weather and the city name.
Like /weather London.
Or you can send the location right now and I'll remember your city for all the next teams until you change it yourself.
